I will add further text here

title: Matthew Roco-Calvo
text:
Hi my name is Matthew Roco-Calvo! This is my website for my ENV S 193 DS project, and I am excited to continually update it as I progress through my education and future career.
I am an undergraduate student at UC Santa Barbara pursuing a bachelor of science in environmental studies and expecting to graduate in June 2027
Currently I am an Undergraduate Research Assistant at the Bren School of working under Zoe Sims studying the effects of intercropping on crop yields. I also am a Docent/Informal Science Educator at the REEF aquarium at UCSB, where I help with animal husbandry tasks such as feeding and cleaning, as well as assisting with outreach programs and educating visitors about the many marine organisms of the Santa Barbara channel.
